title: The Report of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka on the 'Recent Economic Developments': 'Highlights of 2016' and the 'Prospects for 2017'
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Ranil Wickremasinghe, the Prime Minister, in his capacity as the Minister of National Policies and Economic Affairs, to present, the Bi-Annual Report, in order to facilitate discussion on the Annual Budget, prepared by the Central Bank of Sri Lanka on the 'Recent Economic Developments': 'Highlights of 2016' and the 'Prospects for 2017' in Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet.
